item.title: Quick Question!
item.dc:creator: @Kr0nikk Kr0nikk
item.description:
@Kr0nikk wrote:

[quote=“Kayceee, post:14, topic:346308”]I think you edited the wrong thing.
That is where your portal is located, unless that’s what you wanted to change?[/quote]

Well I followed this one guy’s guide (below) and I just changed the X & Y locations for the portal. Because I wanted it next to Edgeville Bank.

Hey guys this is for noobs please do not flame!

Ok well heres the codes

PART 1

find makeglobalobject and put this in with the rest of em

Code:
makeGlobalObject(2961, 3385, 2465, 0, 10);

then change the 2961 to ur X coords and 3385 to your Y Coords

PART 2

search for this if (objectID == 7146) in client class and put this code above that

Quote:
if (objectID == 2465 && donator == 1) {
toX = 2338;
toY = 3170;
} else
if (donator == 0){
sM(“You need to be Donator to go to this spot, donate now!!”);
}

Well then your all done and also change the toX = (to your X Coords) and ToY = (to your Y Coords)

and please dont flame once again its for noobs and its my first snippet Rep please

xxlukexx:

kay, it would be nice if u used code tags and i don’t think this guy need a step by step guide.

Actually I am new to coding, so it was very helpful.

Read full topic

makeGlobalObject(3090, 3489, 2465, 0, 10); //DonatorZone

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question!
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

What did you change? haha.
But anyways, open client.java and hit CTRL + F.
Search for:

makeGlobalObject (3126, 3356, 2709, -1, 10)

And then change it to:

makeGlobalObject (3126, 3356, 2709, -1, 10);

Make sure you include the ‘;’.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question!
item.dc:creator: @Kr0nikk Kr0nikk
item.description:
@Kr0nikk wrote:

client.java:4635: ';' expected makeGlobalObject (3126, 3356, 2709, -1, 10) ^ 1 error Finished!

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question!
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

No, let me explain this code line-by-line.

if (objectID == 2465 && donator == 1) { toX = 2338; toY = 3170; } else if donator == 0) { sM("You need to be a Donator to go to this spot, donate now!!"); }
if (objectID == 2465 && donator == 1) { toX = 2338; toY = 3170;
[THESE LINES ARE SAYING IF YOU CLICK ON THE OBJECT 2465 (WHICH IS A DONATOR PORTAL I BELEIVE) AND YOU ARE A DONATOR THEN YOU WILL BE TELEPORTED TO X COORDINATE 2338 AND Y COORDINATE 3170].

Then:

} else [Obviously means If not/Else].

Then:

if (donator == 0) { [IF YOU ARE NOT A DONATOR/IF YOUR DONATOR RANK IS 0]
sM(“You need to be a Donator to go to this spot, donate now!!”); [SENDS YOU A MESSAGE SAYING THE STUFF IN BRACKETS]

Hope this helped, if you are confused, let me know!

And finally, to make somebody a donator, you will need to go to characters and then find their character file and open it up, you should see something like:

Donor = 0
or
Donator = 0
or
DonatorRights = 0
or
Character-Donator = 0

Or something similar to that, basically the 0 means NO/IS NOT/FALSE
and if you changed it to 1 then it would mean YES/IS/TRUE.

Basically changing the donator rights to 1 would mean you are a donator.

(SORRY IF I CAME ACROSS A LITTLE CONFUSING!)

Read full topic
